## ElevationRangeSource.getElevationRange() method

Compute the elevation range for a given \[\[TileKey\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getElevationRange(tileKey: TileKey): ElevationRange;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tileKey | [TileKey](./harp-geoutils.tilekey.md) | The tile for which the elevation range should be computed. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ElevationRange](./harp-mapview.elevationrange.md)
